block.p: American League KANSAS CITY ROYALS--Placed 2B Carlos Febles on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled OF Scott Pose from Omaha of the PCL. TEXAS RANGERS--Placed RHP Ryan Glynn on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled RHP Francisco Cordero from Oklahoma of the PCL. TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Placed RHP Frank Castillo on the 15-day disabled list.

American League KANSAS CITY ROYALS--Placed 2B Carlos Febles on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled OF Scott Pose from Omaha of the PCL. TEXAS RANGERS--Placed RHP Ryan Glynn on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled RHP Francisco Cordero from Oklahoma of the PCL. TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Placed RHP Frank Castillo on the 15-day disabled list.

National League ATLANTA BRAVES--Activated OF Reggie Sanders from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned OF George Lombard to Richmond of the International League. COLORADO ROCKIES--Activated RHP Mike DeJean from the 15-day disabled list. Designated LHP Scott Karl for assignment. PHILADELPHIA PHILLIES--Activated RHP Jason Boyd from the 15-day disabled list. Designated LHP Mark Holzemer for assignment.
National Basketball Association LOS ANGELES LAKERS--Signed F Stanislav Medvedenko. MIAMI HEAT--Signed G Eddie House. ORLANDO MAGIC--Signed F-C Don Reid.

National Football League ATLANTA FALCONS--Waived WR Kamil Loud. CINCINNATI BENGALS--Waived TE Damian Vaughn. DALLAS COWBOYS--Waived K Rian Lindell and LB Joe Phipps. GREEN BAY PACKERS--Acquired LB Nate Wayne from Denver for a conditional future draft pick. Waived FB Marvin Powell. MINNESOTA VIKINGS--Re-signed RB John Henry Mills and LB Pete Bercich. Signed CB Darnell Walker. NEW ENGLAND PATRIOTS--Waived P James Kibble. PHILADELPHIA EAGLES--Placed DT Giradie Mercer on the injured reserve list. TAMPA BAY BUCCANEERS--Reached an injury settlement with RB Jerry Ellison. Waived S Ashley Cooper.

National Hockey League ATLANTA THRASHERS--Agreed to terms with F Ben Simon. EDMONTON OILERS--Re-signed D Sean Brown to a one-year contract. NASHVILLE PREDATORS--Signed RW Brantt Myhres. PHOENIX COYOTES--Signed F Craig Mills and F Sergei Kuznetsov. SAN JOSE SHARKS--Signed C Jim Montgomery. TORONTO MAPLE LEAFS--Re-signed G Glenn Healy to a two-year contract.
